basics.name: Suman Jayapathi
basics.label: Team Lead - Engineering at Xero
basics.summary:
I am a Engineering Manager/Principal Engineer with 18 years experience, working with iOS, .NET, AWS and Kubernetes.

I am an active proponent of using automation to reduce toil for engineers, I've hired and built-up multiple cross-disciplinary development teams and directed technical roadmaps for mobile and web products.

My personal project consists of automating my home whilst hosting open source apps on a self-hosted k8s cluster, using GitOps.

work.name: Xero
work.summary: Xero's online accounting software automates bookkeeping and other tasks, to connect small business owners with their numbers.
highlights: Led a team to build a JobKeeper calculator in record time which helped 500,000 businesses meet Covid compliance requirements
Worked in a future-state enablement team to design and deploy strategy frameworks for multiple mobile teams
Hired and coached multiple lead and principal engineers across backend, frontend, infrastructure and mobile specialisations
